sentences.en: Chrysler will be able to serve up a substantially better car.
sentences.cn: 克莱斯勒有能力制造更为优异的汽车.

sentences.en: He checked the details given and found them substantially correct.
sentences.cn: 他核实了一下给出的细节，发现它们基本正确。

sentences.en: His account of what happened is substantially accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对事情的叙述实质上是准确的.
他的批评大体上是正确的.

sentences.en: His opinion accords substantially with mine.
sentences.cn: 他的意见和我的意见实质上是一致的.

sentences.en: Johnson's smashing victory in 1964 changed the political horizon substantially.
sentences.cn: 1964年约翰逊的大获成功给政界带来了翻天覆地的变化。

sentences.en: Our concern and theirs substantially overlap.
sentences.cn: 我们的利害关系和他们的大致相合.

sentences.en: Properly designed heat exchangers substantially improve the contacting in the bed by breaking up growing bubbles.
sentences.cn: 合理设计的热交换器能使长大的气泡破碎,以有效地改善床层中的接触.

sentences.en: Supplemental mass - pollination can substantially increase the seed yields in many cases.
sentences.cn: 在许多情况中,辅助混合授粉实际上可以提高种子产量.

sentences.en: The price was substantially higher than had been expected.
sentences.cn: 价格比预计的要高很多。

sentences.en: The skin of an eighty-year-old looks substantially different from that of a twenty-year-old.
sentences.cn: 80岁人的皮肤与20岁人的皮肤看起来有天壤之别。

sentences.en: There are one or two minor differences, but they’re substantially the same text.
sentences.cn: 这些文本有一两处细微差异，但大体上是一样的。

sentences.en: They may be substantially smaller or larger than this number.
sentences.cn: 它们可显著地小于或大于这个数.

sentences.en: This , of course, substantially impairs fertility.
sentences.cn: 这当然会使稔性受到极大损害.

sentences.en: This range is substantially cheaper than any of the other own brands available.
sentences.cn: 这一系列的产品比所有其他超市的自有品牌都要便宜得多。

sentences.en: Wilson was elected, the twins were defeated - crushed , in fact, and left forlorn and substantially friendless.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊当选了, 那两兄弟却遭到了惨败 -- 事实上是一败涂地, 弄得晦气不堪,没人理睬.

words.tran_cn: 大量的；实质的；内容充实的
有实质的；大量的；真实的；独立存在的
实体；实质性；真实价值；内容
名词性实词；独立存在的实体

trans.tran_cn: 本质上，实质上，大体上，充分地，相当多地
trans.tran_en: used to say that in many ways something is true, the same, different etc
